Welcome to FuelSpot! FuelSpot is the platform which you can track gas prices, recent news in addition to vehicle track (average consumption, emission…) and many more! Account created. We need some permission to showing nearest stations! Continue Do you have a car? Yes No / I will add it later Brand Model Primary fuel type Gasoline Diesel LPG Distance Electricity Secondary fuel type If you don\'t have secondary fuel system, leave this empty Kilometer Plate no Fuel symbols By clicking symbols you can order station by your choice (price or distance). Got it! How to register my car? You can add your vehicle clicking add new vehicle button on your profile. To earn bonus, don\'t forget to add your car! How to add fuel? When you go to station, FuelSpot will detect it and send notification. Follow instruction and get your bonus! Your information was saved. Welcome to FuelSpot! MyStation You can manage base station info (prices, facilities, address…) in here. You can see reviews for station by users and reply them in here. You can manage ongoing and past campaigns in here.
